post_title: For Sale - Newly Graded Cicotte (still available) & Kleinow (sold)
post_content:
Just received back from PSA a few weeks ago...

* Ed Cicotte Old Mill - PSA 2.5 (Pop 1, 3 Higher) -- Asking $2,250.00

* SOLD Red Kleinow Boston Polar Bear - PSA 1.5 (Pop 9) -- Asking $120.00

Pictures Below
Wow……that’s a gorgeous Cicotte and an incredibly tough back! GLWS!
